橧字的基本解释

橧
zēng
〔橧巢〕古人用柴薪架成的住处，如“昔者先王未有宫室，冬则居营窟，夏则居橧橧。”

橧
céng
猪圈和猪睡的垫草。

橧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zēng］
［《廣韻》作滕切，平登，精。］
用柴薪堆造的住处。

橧字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橧； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页555第02
【唐韻】子登切【集韻】【韻會】咨騰切【正韻】咨登切，?音增。【韻略】聚薪以居也。【禮·禮運】先王未有宮室，夏則居橧巢。【註】暑則聚薪柴居其上。　又【說文】北地高樓無屋者。【張衡·西京賦】橧桴重棼，鍔鍔列列。　又【廣韻】疾陵切，音鄫。豕所寢也。【揚子·方言】豬檻及蓐曰橧。　又【集韻】徂陵切，音層。【博雅】圈也。

橧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
橧字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
zēng
[Luchao] The dwellings built by the ancients with firewood, such as "the former king did not have a palace, in winter, he lived in a camp, and in summer, he lived in a house."
Li
céng
Mat for pigsty and pigs to sleep.
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zēng］
["Guangyun" made Tengqie, Pingdeng, Jing. ]
A dwelling built with firewood.
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　橧; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 555 02
[Tang Yun] Zi Dengqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Consultation Tengqie [Zheng Yun] Consultation Dengqie, sound increased. 【Rhyme】Gathering salary to live in. 【Rite·Rite Fortune】The first king did not have a palace, and Xia lived in Lichao. [Note] Shu is gathering firewood on top of it.　[Said the text] Northland high-rise buildings without houses. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Heavy 橧桴橴棼, 锷锷列列.　 [Guang Yun] Ji Ling cut, sound 鄫. The hog sleeps too. 【Yangtze Dialect】Pig threshold and Ling said Li.　[Jiyun] Chuling cut, sound layer. [Bo Ya] Circle also.
